projects.name: AspNetCoreCertificates
projects.description: Certificate Manager for .NET - Create, manage, and use X509 certificates in ASP.NET Core applications. Supports development and production certificates with Let's Encrypt integration.

projects.name: AngularWebpackVisualStudio
projects.description: Complete template for building Angular applications with Webpack in Visual Studio. Includes TypeScript, hot module replacement, and production optimization.

projects.name: AspNetCoreLocalization
projects.description: Comprehensive examples and best practices for implementing localization and globalization in ASP.NET Core applications. Supports multiple languages and cultures.

projects.name: SSI Credential Issuer
projects.description: Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI) credential issuer implementation. Issue and manage verifiable credentials using W3C standards and decentralized identifiers (DIDs).

projects.name: SSI DID Resolver
projects.description: Decentralized Identifier (DID) resolver for Self-Sovereign Identity systems. Resolve DIDs to DID documents across multiple methods and networks.

projects.name: AzureAD-OIDC-ASP.NET
projects.description: Production-ready examples of Azure Active Directory integration with ASP.NET Core using OpenID Connect. Includes authentication, authorization, and API protection.
